workflow.name: Generate daily tech, manga & movies newsletter from RSS feeds with Brevo
workflow.description:
# üîß How it works

### Scheduled Trigger

The workflow is triggered automatically every day at 12:00 PM using a Cron node.

### RSS Feed Collection

It fetches the latest content from multiple RSS feeds related to Technology, Manga, and Movies.

### Content Processing & Formatting

The collected data is filtered and organized based on your interests.

A dynamic HTML email template is generated to present the content in a clean and readable layout.

### Email Delivery

The final newsletter is sent directly to your inbox using the Send Email node.

# ‚öôÔ∏è Set up steps

### Configure RSS Sources

Update the RSS feed URLs inside the Set nodes to match your preferred sources.

### Set Email Recipient

Replace the email address in the Send Email node with your own.

### Adjust Schedule

Modify the execution time in the Cron Trigger node if you want the newsletter to be sent at a different time.

### Activate the Workflow

Enable the workflow to start receiving your personalized daily newsletter automatically.

parameters.content:
# üì¨ Personal Daily Tech/Manga/Movies Newsletter

**What it does:**
Automatically curates and emails a personalized daily newsletter with the latest tech news, manga, movies tailored to your interests.

**How it works:**

1. Triggers daily at 12 PM
2. Fetches RSS feeds from your favorite tech, manga, movies sources
3. Make HTML template for mail based on your interests
4. Sends a beautifully formatted newsletter to your inbox

**Set up steps**

1. Update the RSS feed URLs inside the Set nodes to match your preferred sources.
2. Replace the email address in the Send Email node with your own.
3. Modify the execution time in the Cron Trigger node if you want the newsletter to be sent at a different time.
4. Enable the workflow to start receiving your personalized daily newsletter automatically.

**Customize:**
- Change RSS sources in the "Set" nodes
- Update your email address in "Send email" node
- Adjust schedule time in trigger node
